segments.text: Yes , I'm excited to hear about your new product .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'm sure you will love what this new automatic answering system can do for your business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've heard a lot about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Watch our computer demonstration , please . You'll be convinced that our product is superior . ( After the demonstration )
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would have to agree with you . It seems to offer more options than the others . But new product sometimes has a few troubles . How about yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any of our new products shall go through a 1-3 month testing period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , our prices are negotiable , but our quality is not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happens if I am not satisfied with my purchases ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your satisfaction is guaranteed , or we refund your money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . But I have to discuss it over with my boss before I make a decision .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I hope you will be in touch with me shortly .
segments.speaker: S1
